definitions: A document issued by a legal or government official authorizing the police to make an arrest, search premises, or carry out some other action relating to the administration of justice.
A certificate that entitles the holder to acquire a specific number of shares of stock or bonds at a specified price within a set timeframe.
An official certificate of appointment issued to an officer of lower rank than a commissioned officer.
examples: The police arrested him on a valid arrest warrant.
Shareholders received warrants for additional stock.
